scripts.build:contract: cd contract && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ../out/main.wasm
scripts.build:relayer-contract: cd relayer-contract && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ../out/relayer.wasm
scripts.test: npm run build:contract && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run deploy && cd integration-tests && npm run test
